Docs.summary: Specifies the display format for the days of the week on a control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The DayNameFormat enumeration represents the display formats for the days of the week in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
> [!NOTE] > In some cultures, `DayNameFormat.FirstLetter` and `DayNameFormat.FirstTwoLetter` display identical values for one or more days of the week. In these cultures, consider using `DayNameFormat.Shortest`, which displays the shortest abbreviation possible without using identical abbreviations.
## Examples The following code example shows how to specify a format for the format for the days of the week in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
